entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 04:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: WSW 40 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 14 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
